name: Country Breakfast Platter
description: Two eggs any style, crispy bacon, golden hash browns, and buttered toast. The perfect way to start your day!

name: Homemade Meatloaf
description: Our famous meatloaf recipe served with creamy mashed potatoes, fresh green beans, and a dinner roll

name: Country Fried Steak
description: Hand-breaded beef cutlet fried golden brown, topped with pepper gravy, served with mashed potatoes and corn

name: Fresh Apple Pie
description: Homemade apple pie baked fresh daily, served warm with a scoop of vanilla ice cream

name: Soup of the Day
description: Ask your server about today's homemade soup. Served with crackers or cornbread
